author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/neverwinter/

Neverwinter’s Red Harvest Part II - The Soul Collector, is now available! This major update for the free-to-play Dungeons & Dragons MMORPG challenges adventurers to delve deep into the Doomvault to stop Szass Tam's Ritual of Ascendency!

In Neverwinter: Red Harvest Part II – The Soul Collector, the Lich has struck back and lashed out at the fleeing members of the Resistance in Tyraturos, despite the prior uncovering of Szass Tam’s plans for deification and rescuing the captured Celestial. Players will team up with Xuna, who seeks to rescue the missing Harper Tesser. The Hero of Neverwinter is tasked to return with Xuna to Tyraturos, rescue as many of the Resistance members as possible, and escort them to a place where they can continue their work. Szass Tam must be stopped before he completes his Ritual of Ascendency!

#ps4 #ps4games
title: Neverwinter: Red Harvest Part II - Launch Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011786

The surreal liminal-spaces fever dream POOLS is now available on PS5 & PS VR2. 

POOLS invites you into a world of vast, deserted public swimming spaces and submerged corridors, blending haunting liminal architecture with the soothing and at times unsettling presence of emptiness. Is someone watching you? Are they there with you? Is this perhaps just a dream? You’re never quite sure.

#ps5 #ps5games #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Pools - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EP4399-PPSA26575_00-PROJECTMOTORRACE

Project Motor Racing is now available with full mod support across all platforms. Racers tackle the unforgiving world of professional motorsport in single player “Survival”-style career and test their limits in Cross-Play Ranked Online, no-fee custom lobbies, and 2 leaderboards. Enjoy 13 classes of 70  era-defining machines and 28 scanned layouts from 5 continents, each a living, fully reactive rival. Driving is done, time to race! 

#ps5 #ps5games #projectmotorracing
title: Project Motor Racing - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
